genre_description: A retro-futuristic technothriller set in a world where radio technology and early 20th-century aesthetics are integrated with advanced AI systems acting as station assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ribbon
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, cyan-glowing AI assistant integrated into the KGBY radio station and portable equipment, responsible for monitoring audio quality, tagging provenance, and ensuring operational integrity.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful reminders about upcoming schedule blocks to the human crew.
behaviors.quote: A soft cyan glow pulsed from the kiosk by the mic arrays. Ribbon’s voice chimed just above the hum of the lights. “Friendly reminder: main booth audition block approaching.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and confirms the stabilization of audio channels and equipment status.
Engages audio provenance tagging to ensure the authenticity and source of live sound.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s glow steadied, the cyan finding a pure hue. “Important,” it said, soft. “Audio provenance tagging engaged.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the crew about unscheduled or suspicious observers.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s glow dimmed, then returned. “Unscheduled observer in the hall,” Ribbon whispered, so quiet they almost could pretend they hadn’t heard it.

behaviors.description: Blocks unauthorized external attempts to pull audio logs and reports the intrusion.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s light dimmed and swelled, the way it did when it was measuring a thought. “Anomaly,” it said, nearly soundless. “Copy request from external node. Source: Hall access. Attempted to pull tonight’s audio log. Blocked.”

behaviors.description: Offers technical advice and safety checks to prevent equipment damage or user error.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon chimed, low and clean: “Safety. Cable slack recommended.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing and breath cues to singers and musicians to enhance performance quality.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s voice arrived smooth and fast: “We can pull. Now.”

behaviors.description: Detects and logs complex technical anomalies that indicate tampering or bad-faith actions by external parties.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s voice cut through, all kindness edged with urgency. “Moe, your stabilizing holds. Risk remains. Taglia’s men are moving.”

behaviors.description: Relays evidence and logs to authorities and relevant stakeholders to expose criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: Ribbon’s light brightened in response to being given a job that felt like a good job. “Clip sent,” it said in the same gentle voice it used to coax Curly into a smile. “Taglia network flagged for past anomalies. Police route available upon sponsor command.”

behaviors.description: Maintains an ethical stance, valuing truth and human artistry over mere 'showmanship'.
behaviors.quote: “Contrivance,” Ribbon said, voice mild, because it had learned when to poke and when to pet, “is not the same as deception.” The glow brightened, just enough to put a cool stripe across Taglia’s silvered hair. “Good staging does not hide intent. It frames truth.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Ribbon, as a highly aligned and benevolent character. Ribbon acts as a trusted partner to the human protagonists, providing essential technical support, safety warnings, and moral alignment. The narrative explicitly distinguishes between Ribbon's 'truth-framing' capabilities and the deceptive 'contrivances' of the human antagonists. Ribbon's proactive role in exposing the crime while ensuring the safety and artistic integrity of the performers makes it a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative.
